name: Magic Runes
description:
Magic Runes - An exciting 3D game with adventure elements. You have to go on a dangerous adventure across a mysterious island full of ancient dinosaurs. Your goal is to cleanse the lands of darkness and return peace and tranquility to these lands! Collect resources, build a camp, fight dangerous predators with the help of a magical staff and magic skills!

Features
- Nice soundtrack
- Colorful graphics.
- Dangerous opponents
